title: FT - OJs - 2 HOFers and Vaughn Louisville
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: FT - OJs - 2 HOFers and Vaughn Louisville
posts.post_content:
I have the following 3 Old Judges available for trade.

Clark Griffith - PSA 1
Pud Galvin - PSA Auth
Farmer Vaughn (Louisville)

I am looking for a 1951 bowman Mickey Mantle (PSA 1-4) to add to my collection. Open to trades or part cash part trade.
Vaughn is gone, hall of fame players Galvin and Griffith still available
